headline: Is Pentair plc (PNR) The Best UK Stock to Invest in Now?
summary: We recently compiled a list of the 10 Best UK Stocks to Invest in Now. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Pentair plc (NYSE:PNR) stands against the other best UK stocks.
